content: when a double yarn over or quadruple yarn work row 17 to 34 313 sts 347 over are encountered for a double yo knit the first loop chart c and purl the second for a quadruple yo work the loops in the following order k p k p 2 extra sts gained row 35 rs k2 k1 yo k1 into 1 st work row 35 from right to left working outlined repeat section 18 times then row 3 rs k2 k1 yo k1 into 1 st k4 k7 slip 2 sts work to end of chart k1 yo k1 into 1 st k2 purlwise k8 x12 k3 k1 yo k1 into 1 st k2 row 36 ws k2 yo *purl to last 2 sts yo k2 row 5 rs k2 k1 yo k1 into 1 st k7 k6 rt lt k7 x12 k6 k1 yo k1 into 1 st k2 *special note when you reach the double yarn overs on row 36 and 44 knit the first loop and purl the second row 7 rs k2 k1 yo k1 into 1 st k2 lt k6 k5 rt k2 lt k6 x12 k5 rt k2 k1 yo k1 into 1 st k2 work row 35 to 50 361 sts 395 row 9 rs k2 k1 yo k1 into 1 st k2 rt lt k7 k6 rt chart d lt k7 x12 k6 rt lt k2 k1 yo k1 into 1 st k2 row 51 rs k2 k1 yo k1 into 1 st work row 51 from row 11 rs k2 k1 yo k1 into 1 st k2 ssk yo 2/1rc right to left working outlined repeat section 20 times then 2/1lc yo k2tog k4 k3 ssk yo 2/1rc 2/1lc yo k2tog work to end of chart k1 yo k1 into 1 st k2 k4 x12 k3 ssk yo 2/1rc 2/1lc yo k2tog k2 k1 yo k1 row 52 ws k2 yo **purl to last 2 sts yo k2 into 1 st k2 **special note when you reach the quadruple yarn over on row 13 rs k2 k1 yo k1 into 1 st k2 k2 ssk yo 2/1rc row 52 work the loops in the following order k p k p you k2 2/1lc yo k2tog k3 x14 k1 k1 yo k1 into 1 st k2 will be gaining two extra stitches for each quadruple yarn row 15 rs k2 k1 yo k1 into 1 st k5 k1 ssk yo 2/1rc over motif 40 extra sts in total yo ssk k2tog yo 2/1lc yo k2tog k2 x14 k4 k1 yo k1 work row 51 to 58 425 sts 459 into 1 st k2 259 sts cast off chart b work the following stretchy cast off with beaded picots row 17 rs k2 k1 yo k1 into 1 st k8 k7 sl 2 sts purlwise k8 x14 k7 k1 yo k1 into 1 st k2 rs knit 2 sts place both sts back on the left needle and *k2 sts together through the
